title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4110.3 - Certification of time
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4110.3 - Certification of time

State Regulations

Each manual timer and the operator of the electrical
timer shall record his or her or its time for each quarter, or parts thereof, in minutes, seconds and fifths of seconds. Each such timer and operator of said
electrical timer shall sign the judges' book for each race certifying the
official time of the race. No unofficial timing shall be admitted to
record. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4110.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
